website_summaries.verdict: A value-priced model with durable performance. You won't find a better value.
pros: Offers an impressive feature set for the price such as an easy-grip handle, sleek design, and adjustable distance control to fit a variety of materials
cons: Has the tendency to fill quickly when used on heavy materials, but it is easy to clean

website_summaries.verdict: Take this battery-operated lint remover wherever you travel. Comfortable and easy to use, with three blade distance settings.
pros: Notable for its comfort grip handle, which makes removing lint and bobbles a breeze
Features three distance control settings for fabrics
cons: Lint chamber is smaller than other models, requiring frequent changes

customer_reviews.title: The Lint Mower
customer_reviews.text: I have spent hours and hours trying to groom our sofas from millions of tiny lint balls they have acquired over four years. I hoped maybe this dufuzzer might work... and WOW! This thing works like a lint mower! It's really easy to use (our 5-year-old "mowed" most of one sofa) and clean out. Really happy with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Harper

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the rechargeable version and I'm very pleased with it! It is large, but that means that it covers more surface area which gets the job done quicker! I freshened up a tired looking couch in no time! My one complaint would be that the lint catcher is pretty small and I had to constantly stop to check and clean it. All around very happy with it! If you found my review helpful, please click Yes below! :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: First try and killed my happiness
customer_reviews.text: Just got this item today and couldn't wait to try on the sweater, and look how it's done to my Vince sweater :-(
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't think it through when I threw some dark shirts and sweaters in the wash with a couple of light towels. They came out with all those fuzzies. I ordered one of these based on the price and avg. customer review and I can see why this was rated so high. Takkes two AA batteries and is very comfortable to hold. Since it's so portable, I just sat on the couch to watch tv and shaved two shirts and a pair of cottony exercise pants while watching tv. I probably would have never worn these items (at least not outside the house!) again if it wasn't for this great little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Nelson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this short because there are so many other great reviews. This thing is excellent. I just "repaired" 2 cashmere sweaters and one modal blend jersey top to like new condition. The waste compartment fills up quickly and will start clogging the blades if not emptied frequently. I will share one trick I found for emptying the area around the blades. Remove the waste compartment and hold the unit vertically over a garbage can while turning the defuzzer on. Blades will spin and the rest of the pills will fall out. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Fine Print Reader

customer_reviews.title: Does not work and they don't allow returns..
customer_reviews.text: I put in brand new batteries the correct way and it wont turn on. Doesn't turn on no matter what I do. I tried returning it but it says not eligible for return even though I just bought it 2 days ago. I will be contacting amazon to figure this out. ********UPDATE****** Just got off the phone with amazon and they were able to get me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even get through de-fuzzing one large sweater before the motor slowed down further and further, until it stopped completely. I changed the batteries, but it did not help. I would not recommend this product to anyone. The Seller was kind and refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did I have to wait pretty much a full day to actually get to use the thing. Once I was able to use it I was very disappointed. It barely took any of the pills off and that was using the lowest setting, and without the protective plastic cover. AND the dang thing died on me after maybe using it for 5 minutes. I plugged it in thinking I could continue using it plugged-in and nope. It is supposed to be able to be used either corded or cordless. Now it won't turn on at all!!!! Waste of money! Paid almost $30 for 5 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: I should have returned the item immediately
customer_reviews.text: I should have returned the item immediately. I am a knitter and also I wear mostly knit fabrics, so I bought this to eliminate pills from fabrics. This product does not live up to its hype. It does not have a large shaving surface, in reality it is one small spoke that gyrates over the surface. It does not get pills off of sweaters, tops, or even pants. I have tried holding the fabric taught to create more of a smooth surface, still no luck. Please think twice before buying this product. I value other reviews when I buy products and hope you will do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Wilton

customer_reviews.title: WORKS BEAUTIFULLY!
customer_reviews.text: I chose to get the battery operated model because I am so tired of spending money on rechargeable items that fail to recharge properly. This de-piller de-fuzzer works better than any thing else I have tried over the years - and I have tried so many different things. I decided to start with a knit shirt I love, but was ready toss because the fabric pilled so badly. IT WORKED BEAUTIFULLY! My only criticism of this unit is that the "tank" that catches the fuzz is not as big as it needs to be, so you have to empty it frequently. But it worked so well my shirt looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: dandelackland

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in first 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I received this sweater shaver yesterday, put new batteries in it and it worked well for 20 minutes then abruptly stopped working during the first use. We cleaned the fuzz from the partially full fuzz trap, tried a different set of fresh batteries and it still won’t work. Upon trying to return it the Amazon app says it’s not returnable. I called Amazon customer service and the agent immediately agreed with me, says she doesn’t know why the manufacturer won’t allow returns, and gave me a refund immediately. Amazon stands behind its customers but Conair does not.
customer_reviews.author: sg

customer_reviews.title: Kills jagged little pills
customer_reviews.text: I love this new lint remover! All my sweaters have “pilled” so badly I really needed a good tool to remove them. It’s easy to install batteries and operate. My only complaint is the lint collector is way too small and will stop working effectively when it’s full. I had to use a toothpick to get all of it out; then put the hand held part into the trash turning it on to get the rest of the lint out from around the blades. If you don’t lint will fly all over the place. Otherwise, it works pretty good getting rid of those annoying little pills... almost as gratifying as an episode of Dr. Pill Popper.
customer_reviews.author: Lady K

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little gadget. It's cheaply made so I only gave it 4/5, but works great. It may not last long but it's already saved me from having to buy another coat so it's paid for itself. I have an old, black, wool pea coat that was covered in pills. It looked like it was ready for the trash bin. I used this little gadget on it and now it looks like a new coat. I used the closest shaving setting for the coat and a different setting for a fuzzy sweater that attracts lint like crazy. It's easy and fun to use. See my video.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Rice

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, on the hunt for a better one.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product from Conair. I had heard amazing things from Instagram influencers, but I don’t understand what the hype is about. The lint catcher container hardly holds anything, forcing you to constantly clean it. If you don’t clean it, the shaver will not work. Lint gets stuck inside the machine and it’s hard to get out. I’m surprised that there is no small cleaning tool that comes with the shaver. The lint catcher should be five times the size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Works well but dies quickly - twice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product twice. I sell vintage and used clothing so I use fabric shavers almost daily. That said, I believe I am careful and use them properly, and that they should last years not months. The shaver is easy to use and very effective initially. Both machines got progressively worse quickly and died after a few months. They still turned on, they still sounded like they were working, but they weren’t. This could be related to how difficult they are to clean. Infrequent users may have a different experience but I’m back on the hunt for the best depiller.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a defuzzer for my sweaters for a few years now and finally bought this one. It worked great for about 5 minutes then seemed to be dull. I also went through two sets of batteries. I laid a sweater on my bed to defuzz it and it looked ok while flat on the bed, but once I picked it up and held it from the hanger I could see all kinds of fuzz balls still on it. I had high hopes for my sweaters looking great again after using this product but they were short-lived.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Melton

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, didn't work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I chose conair because I have had good experiences with their products for years. Like others have said, the waste compartment is small. At first, I rated this defuzzer as good because the waste compartment fills up. However. when I looked at it more, it seems like what happens is that it does take pieces of the sweater material, but doesn't get rid of the pills/bumps the way I was expecting. That's why the pictures I uploaded didn't include a picture of the "renewed" sweater. A little surprise was that the battery door (it didn't come with batteries) is well engineered and easy to operate. I don't know why other battery doors don't work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had purchased this a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: Our sofa is eight years old and the fabric has been showing signs of wear. Especially with our dogs jumping up and down on it, little picks in the fabric and accumulation of little fuzz balls from when the sofa cover was off. I used this little shaver and it's just incredible, the fabric looks smooth again, such a difference. After cleaning this up the cover is definitely staying on until guests come over! I bought the rechargeable version and it works great. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LovemyJRTs

customer_reviews.title: Rechageable version works great!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a battery operated defuzzer, but the blade would slow and eat the fabric when the batteries were dying. I decided to upgrade to the rechargeable version when I needed to de-fuzz a 12-cushioned couch. It was in continuous use for at least an hour and kept going. Emptying the tiny lint trap is quick work. The product can be used while it's charging. It didn't eat holes into the fabric, and it didn't die! I know the battery operated one costs less, but I'd suggest springing for the rechargeable version.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Is this a joke?
customer_reviews.text: So excited to get this and after about 10 brand new batteries I gave up. Does not work and the kicker? Amazon wont exchange it. Its nonrefundable. I spoke to a rep and he said so sorry but no need to return just keep it. What?? Thanks. Ill def keep something that doesnt work and you guys keep my money. In what world does that make any sense. So now Im out ten or so bucks and have a useless piece of cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Weaver

customer_reviews.title: PUT THIS IN YOUR CART RIGHT NOW
customer_reviews.text: About six months ago, I bought a new couch. After literally days, it had more pills than a pharmacy. I was pretty devastated that the purchase I’d spent months agonizing over looked like I’d hauled it off the curb. I found this defuzzer on a Buzzfeed article and thought I’d give it a shot. Right out of the box, I spent 5 minutes shaving my couch, and it looks SO MUCH BETTER (see before/after pics). Then I moved on to sweaters. Sweatshirts. Wool coats. Car upholstery. You name it. It got defuzzed. If you’re tired of your stuff looking like the discarded contents of a secondhand store, put. this. in. your. cart.
customer_reviews.author: d_staats

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean alright
customer_reviews.text: Never owned a lint remover before, and after getting this one, I'm convinced that I should've purchased one a few years back! My old clothes that I'm trying to sell are now lint free. It's easy to use, convenient to clean by removing the front, and catches all the lint in one place. Any lint in its way will be gone! Just be careful not to use it on certain clothings that are not supposed to have its lint removed, use your own judgement :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Impulsive Purchase lol
customer_reviews.text: Totally bought this as an impulse buy....not really knowing what or why lol but omg...best thing ever!!! I had purchased a $30+ Gymshark tank top and it had pilled so easily after the first wash. I was so disappointed, but this little fella saved my shirt!!! Now you bet I'm going around the house shaving everything. We had bought new couch slipcovers from Amazon to cover our toddler-affected couches...and well, our cat saw an amazing opportunity and climbed over the whole thing and his claws pulled up some threads all over both couches. AGAIN, this little shaver came to the rescue! Back to new!!! it's small, portable, battery-operated, and perfect! I wish I had this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mandeville

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitate to give it five stars as I’ve only had it a short time, but it did a great job on my hand knit items. I had a pair of socks that were completely covered in pills and fuzz and this made them look like new. I was really amazed. I wish I would have taken a before and after photo to post. The container that holds the removed lint isn’t very big so it fills up fast and it’s a bit fiddly to clean. Also would have been nice if it would have included a little brush to clean around the blades, etc. But overall I’m really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, cleans easily, lifesaver.
customer_reviews.text: It came precharged and was easy to use. I think the megative reviewers are harsh and may come from inexperienced users. If you have never used a sweater shaver/de-piller, I highly recommend you practice on scraps of fabric of different thicknesses before shaving your favorite clothing item. Make sure your fabric is smoothed completely flat and be gentle with the shaver, careful not to push too hard or have uneven amounts of pressure, or else you will end up with some fancy cut outs. Easy to clean, easy to charge, used it on a casual blazer, sweater, jackets, and some soft shirts and plan on using it for many more sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: TeacupsNTextbooks

customer_reviews.title: Money Saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like every other day my wife would complain about her “pilly” sweaters and then they’d end up in trash or donate pile. Well, NO MORE!!! She uses this constantly to make her sweaters look new again. I’ve even used it myself. Way better than a crappy lint roller. This product is cool because you can plug it in and use while battery is charging, or take it mobile! It’s been unplugged for days on end and continues to work at full power. Hasn’t died yet. That little container fills up with fix so quickly. Really works. Now I just wish my fellow countrymen would work. Let’s get that tax payer pool as big as possible!
customer_reviews.author: Itsrob11

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This does the trick! It was easy to get going. I did need the instructions for how to disassemble to get the lint from behind the blades but ince I knew how to do that I was good to go. I had 2 pillows that had pilling all over them. After hitting them with the defuzzer they are like new again. It took me about 30 minutes to do both sides of 2 bed-size pillows. The device did not lose power and the batteries will be good to run through some of my sweaters next. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and works!
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as pictured and described. It was very easy to use and it worked pretty well. It was difficult to remove all the fuzz that had collected behind the blades inside of the shaver itself but, I was able to get it all out with a pair of tweezers. Overall, it worked really well and was able remove almost all the fuzz I had on my sweaters and winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked on 2/13, the return window closed 2/14, it quit working 2/15.
customer_reviews.text: Used this a few times and it worked great. Took it out today to use it and it would not turn on. Tried changing out batteries, checked for any physical problems that would prevent it from working (but it worked the day before yesterday just fine), and tried several times to turn it on, but it would not work. The infuriating thing is that the return window closed yesterday...one day before I discovered it had quit working. 😡
customer_reviews.author: southern belle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, easy to use and comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: The battery operated version I find it’s quite effective without damaging fabric. It’s very comfortable to hold and use, unlike other brands I’ve used over the years. I like, too, that it has a removable fabric guard that allows me to use it on especially low pile fabrics like my sheets. And since I have exceptionally dry skin due to bad eczema and psoriasis, I really need that feature to shave areas that my feet and other dry/hardened areas have snagged. If I were to buy this again, I think I’d splurge for a rechargeable version. It doesn’t use up the batteries fast but I would prefer the peace of mind knowing I didn’t forget to remove batteries for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mistie Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the battery powered version!
customer_reviews.text: The day this arrived, I put two fresh and newly opened AA batteries in it. It ran great and I immediately started shaving my favorite sweater...the batteries died! I couldn't even get the front of the sweater complete before it completely died. I tried to return the product, but the one I purchased is not eligible for return. So, it just eats through my batteries routinely. Do yourself a favor and don't buy the battery-powered version!
customer_reviews.author: ylime

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: we love this fabric shaver for our chenille sofa. It had pilled up pretty badly over the last couple of years of use...but the shaver made the cushions look like new. It is really easy to remove the lint collection container to clean it out. We use a longer wooden kbob stake to also clean the fuzz out from under the blade. Get this if you have fabric that has pills.
customer_reviews.author: tk_atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Saved my clothes budget
customer_reviews.text: So thankful to have found this little defuzzer. I had several shirts and sweaters that were about ready for the thrift store, but I kept hanging on to them because they were my favs, even though they were fuzzy to the point of embarrassment. After using this little gem, I felt I had an entirely new wardrobe. It works perfectly for my needs and I could not be happier. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: drynard

customer_reviews.title: Great power and fast removal of those fuzz balls.
customer_reviews.text: Charged this up and used it cordless on three different items with complete ease. This has a nice amount of power to be such a small item. It went right through those fuzz balls like melted butter. I have only used it three times but that was all cordless and so far the battery is holding up strong. The shaver area is larger than than last one I had bought. I hate pilling on clothes. I highly recommend. If anything changes I will add an update. (You know you are old when something like this can make you so happy) #nomorepilling.
customer_reviews.author: Prepper Mom

customer_reviews.title: Stop taking your pet to the office....
customer_reviews.text: Tired of your fuzzy tie staring at you in the office begging you to play? Tired of people giving you questioning looks as you “pet” your tie to flatten the raised tie hair? Just wished that you had listened to your dad and gotten a real job working with your hands outdoors while singing the Lumber Jack Song rather than worrying about unsightly tie hair? Well, worry no longer. This device works wonders to cure what ails your urban manhood. Feel confident as you strut your fashionable new rose coloured tie that you don’t have any tie hair out of place. Also works on your Mohair sweaters and other metro fashions. Cheers,
customer_reviews.author: Ian Grant

customer_reviews.title: Worked Okay
customer_reviews.text: I think I did see some improvement on the two sweaters I used this defuzzer on. There was definitely fuzz inside the compartment when I emptied it, but I guess I didn't see a drastic improvement of the amount of pilling on my sweaters though. I did adjust the height to get the blades as close to the sweater as possible. Fortunately, I didn't have any issues like some other reviewers who said they saw holes in their sweaters afterwards. Make sure the sweater is perfectly flat on a flat surface and don't press too hard on the defuzzer, I let it held it gently over top.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: FOR THE PRICE CANT BEAT IT
customer_reviews.text: My snowboarding jacket is several years old but still in great condition. With that said, the fabric is losing its condition over many washes and will latch onto the Velcro tabs, pulling and pilling up after being in the washer cycle and laying it out to dry. I bought this thing based on the majority positive reviews and it works like a charm. I agree that the container that holds the lint is small and can be difficult to clean. Just use water to flush it out and/or a Q-tip to grab the lint/dry it out. Its a great travel size as its light weight and compact.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL E.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product being used by an interior decorator on Instagram and decided to try it. This product is the best invention in lint removing world. Lint rollers are just a pain and don't even do the job well. Conair thank you for this life saver. I almost threw this sweater away but it cleaned it out very nicely. The pictures don't show how bad it was. You can tell by the change in sound that it's time to empty the container. The battery lasts a while with full charge. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Freshened up several dresses that had pills on them...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove the pilling from my polyester work dresses. It is working well to remove the pills from these surfaces. It works best to shave the article of clothing while you are wearing it (the pressure of your body against the clothing provides for an easier surface to shave). It is easy operate and to remove the shavings. I like the handle. It is superior to the shaver I had years which had no handle. Note that this works on some fabrics better than others. I had lesser results when using this on a rayon cotton blend. It works well on pills but not as well on fuzz. Overall, I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. McW

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: In LOOOOVEEEE. I have tried shaving clothing but it’s tedious and not a perfectly clean finish. This product removes about 80% of fuzz on the clothing I have tried, and it really helps to restore the original look of the fabric. Only advice, do not run it over any headlines, as it will cut. And it is best to use on a flat surface to prevent creating any holes. This only happened to me when I pressed/pinched the area I wanted to defies directly onto the razor. Test out on a old shirt first, before going to your more delicate items. Does take a bit of practice
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those gadgets I've been meaning to buy for years and for some reason had not. In my quest to reduce my consumerism, rather than get rid of clothes that have gotten pilly I thought I'd try this. It's amazing! I don't like to spend a lot on my preschooler's school clothes because they get ruined, but I don't like when they look shabby either. Her thick winter leggings especially seem to catch and pill a lot. This device has done wonders for that, and have given some of my clothes new life as well. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this!
customer_reviews.text: While using, the fabric of my shirt bunched up a little and got caught in the shaver. It cut several small holes in my shirt. My last fabric shaver never did this. Disappointed and wish I could still return for a refund. I'm too scared to use this on any other clothing.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Light Touch and Satisfying
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I bought the shaver to try to revitalize some work clothes. I had a couple pillow shams I was going to throw out and thought why not give it a go with the shaver. Oh my goodness! So amazing and I'm not throwing them out now. Middle setting worked best. Note. For sweaters be careful to keep the shaver flat and use a gentle touch.... I accidentally put a small hole in my favorite sweater because I was too eager and having too much fun with this tool. User error and not the tool. There is something so satisfying about this, though. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MtnHiker

customer_reviews.title: Works well, needs better lint cup
customer_reviews.text: It works really well, but gets clogged very fast. The lint cup is small and shaped as to allow the lint to get backed up very quickly behind the blades. If they make the cup more circular, it would catch more lint I believe. And I have to use a long thin implement to pick out the lint each time. This is still a VERY good lint shaver, and I am also pleased with the spacer and general ease of use. I would still recommend this fabric shaver, and would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: This machine is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! My pesky cats have taken too scratching our dining chairs. We’ve trained them out of it but the chairs still looked awful. My friends recommended this product and I couldn’t be more pleased with it. Easy to use, has three level settings, the fibers go into an easy to clean section so no mess! I honestly am very impressed, thought I’d need to replace my chairs but they have come up like new!
customer_reviews.author: Fitnessaddict

customer_reviews.title: changing my review
customer_reviews.text: i got this item and thought it was defective so im changing my review, i apologize for the previous negative review. i thought i had put new batteries in but accidentally put old ones in and it didnt work, i decided to open new batteries and try again, it worked perfectly, i used it for a few times to test it so, im giving it 5 stars. im trying to give back the refund without getting double billed accidentally. Again i apologize for my v mistake, it was human error not the fabric shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of sweaters that are all pilled. I really like them but not with the pills. I was ready to give them away when I saw this shaver on a Buzzfeed list of helpful things. I'm so glad I got this! I started using it on my sweaters right away and they look so much better. I've been shaving one thing after another. It works great and it's amazing how much fuzz come off one sweater. One thing...keep the item you are shaving very taut. I put a pillow under mine, lay it flat not letting it wrinkle. If the fabric get loose, I've found the shaver can pinch some of the material and make a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Low Bow

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but snags fabric and cuts holes in it
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and thinks it works really well if your product is incredibly flat and has no texture/bumps, but if there are any seams then this will actually snip right through and cut a tiny hole, which unfortunately happened with both a pair of my shorts and a sweater of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Lee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t turn on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of July. I didnt open or use it. My mom does embroidery and mentioned she needed one so I held on to it and gifted as a Christmas present. I should of checked to make sure it worked when I got it but didn’t think of it. When we plugged the charger in the light turned red, but but the defuzzer would not turn on. I thought maybe it needed more time to charge so we left it for about 24hrs and tried again. Nothing. It doesn’t work. Maybe you’ll have a better experience, but I’m not too impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Draper

customer_reviews.title: Small and shaves pretty well but mess with lint produced
customer_reviews.text: The simplicity, small shape and light weight is nice on the hand. It shaves pretty well, and guide head is adjustable. But, when I set it down mid use in any position, particles of the lints shaved off just flowed out like a dust. Makes a mess, and a lot of clean up, including having to clean all of the shaver to wipe away the lint that's all over it. Never had this with previous shavers.
customer_reviews.author: libcat11

customer_reviews.title: This is a couch saver!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product. We bought our fabric couch one year ago and recently noticed these small fuzz balls collecting on the areas that are sat on most which was making the couch itchy on your legs. I heard about this product and decided to give it a try. This is a miracle worker! It took some time to get all the fuzz balls off the couch but once they were gone my couch was super soft and back to normal again. This is definitely worth buying!! Give it a try you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works great, comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice fabric defuzzer. I've had it for almost a year and use it about a couple of times a month. So far it has not malfunctioned. It's easy to use, operates on batteries, has simple instructions. It does make sound when defuzzing so this is not a quiet unit. I usually place the clothing/fabric flat on a table or ironing board to defuzz. This way I am able to defuzz without accidentally making a hole in the clothing/fabric. I liked this defuzzer so much because it's so easy to use and clean that I recently got one for my mom to use also. She loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Maksim Ustinov

customer_reviews.title: Defective and non-returnable
customer_reviews.text: Product received and it’s defective. I tried multiple batteries, and even switched the battery positions just to get it to work but it won’t turn on. Very disappointed because the seller doesn’t accept returns. When this is the case, I expect the product to work exactly as described. Don’t recommend that you buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tina from CA

customer_reviews.title: Great defuzzer
customer_reviews.text: Really great defuzzer! I sell Pre-owned clothing online and this defuzzer is great for helping spruce up some of my items that are a bit more worn. I will say that once while using it, it the blade snagged on a shirt and put a hole in it so be careful when using it on thin material. Keep the fabric flat and hold it as taut as you can. The last defuzzer I owned plugged into the wall and the cord was a real pain so I love that this one is cordless
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: WORKS LIKE AN ERASER! AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this. I got the pink battery operated one. I was so amazed on how well this item worked for my bed sheets!!!! I had it on the lowest setting, swiped it across the balls stuck to my sheets and it disappeared like magic!!! I will always have one of these handy. I was going to throw away my sheets but now they look brand new again! I am so happy. Thank you so much for making this god sent device!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are right.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I actively go out of my way to find things to de-pill/de-fuzz. I have cats and from time to time their adorable claws find their way into my couch, but with this machine, I can keep the couch looking nice for company. And it's just so satisfying to use! Highly recommend. (I would also say on surfaces with tougher fabric, the guard is not necessary if you're trying to get rid of very tiny pills or fuzz, but use CAUTION.)
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Must have for hoodies
customer_reviews.text: Life changing product. If you wear hoodies a lot or knitted hats, this is for you. I wear a hoody every day. Winter or summer...I work in an office with an abundance of computers so they keep the office cold. The little balls that form after a while on your sweaters or hoodies gets annoying and makes your hoodies look old and dingy. This lint remover all of the balls. It has different levels so you have the option to not get close to fragile clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Fruit Snacks

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Works okay but fuzz receptacle is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: When I got this I used it to de-pill a couple of wool sweaters. The actual shaving was fine (and even somewhat meditatively relaxing :)), but the fuzz collection was not. The receptacle is small and narrow. The entrance quickly jams up and most of the fuzz is collected in the space behind the shaving head. Then it starts slowing down, making you think your batteries are dying. So, get yourself a brush and tweezers and plan to clean out behind the shaving head after every 3-5 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: TMS

customer_reviews.title: Pillows like new
customer_reviews.text: I thought these slightly overpriced (for me) pillow covers were done for until I bought this lint remover and was able to shave them down, almost like new!! In the pic, I left one side as is and used the remover on the other side. Pic may not be as clear as in real life, but the difference is incredible!! I’ve used this on my couch as well and plan to use it on my couch upstairs next. Handy little tool!! One I may be remembering when it comes time to buy affordable but useful Christmas presents!! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill P.

customer_reviews.title: Saves My Sweaters
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. When I was a kid my sweaters lasted forever. Now they are all made in China, and they pill after the third wearing. This appliance solves the problem. It scrapes the lint off in seconds. I like that I don't have to deal with batteries. Yes, the other reviews are true - the lint reservoir is undersized. But it makes no difference. I'm only doing one sweater at a time, and then I empty it in seconds. I am so glad I finally found something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work 😞
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to like this product because we desperately need a defuzzer for sweaters & knits. This was a total bummer! It ran maybe 7 minutes & then quit. Cleaned it out. Tried again. It turned on & off intermittently on its own as if possessed. It never turned on long enough to use it. We put in new batteries, held it up, held it down, turned it left, turned it right. Nothing. Attempting to return it. Don’t waste your time & money. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working immediately
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t work. Within five minutes of using it, it no longer shaves any fuzz off fabric. Amazon says it’s ineligible for return. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: rnrkay

customer_reviews.title: Total let down
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews of how to remove sweater pilling and this one was rated as excellent quality for the cheap price. It worked on 1 sweater and that's it. Done. It won't trim the pills off any others regardless of the texture of the sweater or height/quantity of the pills. I had to use a q-tip to scoop out built up pills inside, which is probably why the blades aren't working. I'm really disappointed and now frustrated that I can't see a return button anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Graveline

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: March: I’ve only used this product a few times and it did the job well. Unfortunately, when I took it out this morning to use it, it completely stopped working . I changed the batteries and tried cleaning it . It doesn’t work anymore. Super disappointed. Only worked for about 3 1/2 months. December Review: This product does exactly what it says it will do, it made my clothing look so much better .
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: Life saver! My laundry sidekick.
customer_reviews.text: This lil guy packs a punch! I never thought I could be so excited over a laundry product, but after my comforter developed a bunch of pilling recently (unknown how), I needed to find a solution. That’s where this guy comes in handy! It took a while for me to get rid of all the nasty lil beads, but it now feels soft like it once was. For a queen size comforter, only spot touch ups, it took me around 20-30 min. I believe this is so worth it. If there’s one single laundry product you need, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian R.

customer_reviews.title: This thing really works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for something like this for years. It’s because I saw an article specifically about this defuzzer — they were amazed at the price — that I took a chance. I love it! I’ve defuzzed sweaters, a fleece blanket, an alpaca sweater, a coat with knit trim. I highly recommend it. (Be gentle with it).
customer_reviews.author: TheBoys

customer_reviews.title: Garbage that Amazon doesn’t allow a return for
customer_reviews.text: Used this for 5 minutes at it failed to remove any significant pilling, then had a sharp and audible decline in the motor’s function. Attempted to initiate a return and got an auto response that it can’t be returned (despite being Prime, sold by Amazon.com, and less than 30 days from purchase!). Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Died 2 weeks after the return window. Underpowered and disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this sweater shaver, I immediately had doubts about it. It was underpowered and died randomly while defuzzing. I thought maybe it was batteries so I kept switching out batteries and every few minutes it kept dying. It never even really shaved well, and I should’ve listened to my instincts and returned it. Now we are two weeks past the return window and it has died completely. It won’t turn on even with new batteries and like I said, never really worked like I expected to begin with. Definitely not what I expecting and a waste of money. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Liberman

customer_reviews.title: Not so long battery life?
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a sweater I put in a dryer with towels, it came out fuzzy. After about a half hour it is either getting full or batteries are giving up. This is a major job, so if normal or occasional use batteries may last longer. I was getting tired anyway, after changing batteries I will report if it perked up. After using my Handheld vac I realized just emptying the fuzz collector was not enough. The unit still had fuzz in it and when this was extracted, some by hand, the unit finished the task and was still on the same batteries.. Just have to not overuse it and empty often.
customer_reviews.author: tim gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: This Defuzzer costs a bit more and it's worth it. Read the instructions before using. You can see and hear when the fuzz trap is filling. Just stop, empty and clean all the fuss before continuing. When shaving our first cashmere sweater, we needed to clean out the fuzz trap and the blades three times. It's easy to do. We found that it works best using light pressure and small circular motions. We have salvaged three sweaters and still have a couple more to go,
customer_reviews.author: JPerryE

customer_reviews.title: So useful on more than just clothes!
customer_reviews.text: We've used this on sweaters, old t-shirts, cardigans, even socks! Then we ended up trying it on some of my kids' sheets & it was incredible! Even those (apparently cheaply-made) Disney sheets that start to pill after the second wash... it made them smooth like new again! This thing is pretty fabulous. I plan on buying this exact same model when we wear out the motor on the one we have (because it's sure to happen as I find more and more things to try it on ;)).
customer_reviews.author: jlee

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was EXTREMELY disappointed.. at first it was doing great.. but after about 3 sweaters.. the motor just slowwwwedddd down to like nothing.. changed out batteries 2 times didn't make a different .. requested a refund.. got it but they said to keep it.. so it sits in a box.. a shame cause with the name "Conair" and all the "great" reviews... I expected so much more.. first time I think i've ever given a bad or 1 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! Its one of my pet peeves to see little balls of Lint all over my clothes! This has also saved me from getting all new sheets! They feel as soft as the day we got them now! I would definitely reccomend this! Just be careful to lay whatever you are shaving flat with no creases or it might put a small hole in that area. I have been shaving everything I can find with those little lint balls and I dont think I could have chosen a better option!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. Not sure if I got a defective one or not but I bought it to replace my old fabric shaver and this one stops as soon as you apply it with the slightest pressure to any fabric. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Ebony H

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of blade setting
customer_reviews.text: Piece of advice: be aware of the distance of the blade before you start shaving clothes. Test on something old if you have it too. It's probably a good idea to adjust the clear piece to be farther away and work closer if needed. Also, the clothing should be flat when the blad touches it so there is less chance of tearing. I included a before/after picture. So far, this little device is amazing. I've used them before but haven't had a use for one in a while, but some of my favorite skirts and sweaters have started to pill and we're looking too worn. This has saved my favorite vintage pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Love Starbucks

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how good this works. I wish I had more things with piling. It’s so satisfying to restore things. I threw out my favorite sheets because my dog loves to scratch them and then they get rough. It works on sheets beautifully. I brought it to freshen up couch pillows and now they look like new. I included a picture. The one on the left is shaved and the one on the right I haven’t done yet. The picture doesn’t do it justice, especially with the improvement in texture and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Karnick

customer_reviews.title: Easy, good, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow wooow!! I have this white duvet that has the nastiest pile up towards the foot area and it feels like little bugs. But I love the color of the duvet and tried the shaver method and that was a bust so I figured I would see what was the best option. This had so many good reviews I figured I would try it out. I couldn’t hold my excitement in and tried it as soon as i had received it and wow it’s so good 😩
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good but can ruin your stuff if negligent!
customer_reviews.text: So I love this thing! It works great. I will say though if you’re not using this properly you’re GONNA ruin your clothes. I usually stuff a pillow in my clothes to stretch it out to make sure there are no pinch points. I got carried away and bit a hole in my top. My fault for not taking the time to make sure it was flat. Good thing it was under the arm! The most horrible thing about this product is the lint trap! It’s a terrible design! Other than that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Munday

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on a list of must-have products, and it was not wrong! I had a heavily pilled blue bedsheet (image attached) that looked so bad I was going to throw it out. I decided to give this a try (I wanted to use it on something cheap before trying it on my couch). As you can see from the attached images, it worked amazingly well! I am so pleasantly surprised that now I want to use it on everything! I’m not quite sure how I’m going to clean the blades, as some lint has built up around them, but I’ll cross that bridge when I get to it. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mock

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Only 1 small complaint.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My only complaint would be the lint trap. The fuzz doesn't always go in to it and some gets stuck behind the blades making it more difficult to clean out but it's worth it for the amazing job it does. I'd recommend. Just a little tip, make sure there isn't any fuzz trapped in the top behind the blades or it slows the motor down and doesn't work as well. Keep it empty. I just blew it out and wiped the inside with a q-tip. Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this thing is addictive! I’ve been shaving my furniture, wool sweaters, blankets, and anything else I can find for weeks! Batteries last fairly long and fabric is like new again. My living room furniture is rarely used but the linen weave started pilling almost immediately after we purchased it, making it seem old and worn. My only complaint is the lint sometimes gets stuck inside when trying to empty the chamber. Other than that, it’s fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: J. Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Brought life back to worn clothing!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Has brought life back to many items. Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because the openings near the blades are a little large & it’s easy to catch the fabric in them & cut a hole in your item. Using this when item is flat to keep fabric flat (instead of while wearing Item or running hand under) seems to keep issue from happening, but still be mindful of the possibility. I cut a hole in 2 different shirts before I learned.
customer_reviews.author: tln

customer_reviews.title: Couch savior
customer_reviews.text: Included a before and after picture of my couch. I'm a guy and I didn't know these things existed. Started noticing blue fuzz balls on my light badge couch and had no idea how to remove them. Then I stumbled onto this little magic device. It took about 3 minutes to go over the three bottom and back cushions. Emptied it 3x and and the results are amazing. I'm so happy with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: ROMAN M

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, it's addicting!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how addicting this little device could be! Works great on shirts, hoodies, pants, and even socks! It easily removes those pesky little pills that form on jersey/cotton type material. I was amazed by how quickly the reservoir filled with lint. See my photo for a side-by-side comparison of a pair of sweat pants I used it on. It returned the fabric to feel just like new, so soft and smooth. I think this purchase also will help save me money since I used it on the inner thigh area of a pair of work pants I was considering throwing away since the pills had gotten so big and painful to wear. 5 stars all around!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Even gets rid of Godzilla sized pilling
customer_reviews.text: So I got this to clean up a couple sweaters. It worked fine. Then I started wondering how it would do on an old pair of pink shorts that had tons of pilling inside. Then I thought about this satin body pillow case with its giant pills. Just for giggles I tried it, never dreaming it would work. But it did. Blew me away! It’s pretty lightweight, very simple to use. Easy to dump out the shavings too. Well worth it! It is kind of addicting though...
customer_reviews.author: mamabird

customer_reviews.title: For the Price it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a fabric shaver for a while now as ours was just old and didn't work right. I came across the Conair Fabric Defuzzer. The best part I liked about it was it had a rechargeable battery. It works great. I have used it on one of my winter jackets and on the fabric sofa set. No problems so far. As long as you keep it clean, you will be just fine. The removal of the container was a little touch but it works. It does the work. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure what to expect, looked at several brands with that you get what you pay for feeling. I choose this one because of the brand name. It was a good choice. It cleaned my couch pilling completely. My only complaint is the very small compartment that holds the fuzz. It works so well you have to stop and empty often. Highly recommend. Came on Prime like they promise. Prime promises are beginning to be unicorns. Rarely done.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Weak motor that bogs down under a little bit of lint.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the battery powered version. It has a very weak motor that spins well when it's new but as soon as you start putting pills and lint into it, the motor slows down significantly. It's not a battery issue. I used fresh batteries. It's just that even a little bit of lint that gets into the blade area or onto the motor spindle is enough resistance that the motor can't overcome it and slows down. I had to clean the inside (take the cover off, clean around and behind the blades) frequently during the shaving of one sweater just to keep the motor going at a moderate speed. They should've shelled out for a stronger motor.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Better to get a manually operated one!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this! I'm afraid that the fuzz holder got full almost right away, I took it off. Secondly, I was so concerned that it was going to cut the wool thread on my lovely (and expensive! ) cardigan. Thirdly, it did shave off the pills but it took many, many repeated strokes which I was reluctant to do because of the chance of snagging the yarn in this.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The tool I never knew I always needed
customer_reviews.text: I was so sick of the little fuzzy balls all over all of my sweaters and leggings. Specifically on my inner thighs where they rubbed together and it caused some MAJOR fuzziness. (NOT A FAN) I saw this tool being advertised to help that problem so I purchased and I don't know why I haven't had one of these before!! Although it looks a bit awkward when you're removing the fuzzy things from the inside of your legs (hahah, maybe I could actually take my leggings off once in a while???) it's a life saver! My leggings and sweaters look like new, and I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Savaglio

customer_reviews.title: Did what I wanted it to do, but lint collector area too small. Had to empty it alot.
customer_reviews.text: I had a hoodie that had alot of lint after washing. This tool did what I wanted it to in the sense that it removed all of the lint where the hoodie had no more lint and it was wearable in public again. The reason for the low star rating is primarily due to the fact that the lint area that capture the lint was so small that I had to empty it repeatedly. The other annoyance was that the lint would get stuck behind the spinner blades where I had to use a tweezer to pull all of it out, otherwise the blades would not spin either.
customer_reviews.author: EJ Tom

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a year until I had to replace the batteries, and then the darn thing died. So I spent about $30 on a different brand because it is a handy appliance. If you have the money, just buy a higher quality one because it is a good gadget to have and extends the life of a lot of fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: A sensible person

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little defuzzer
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews on things, but when I do, it's because it is warranted. WOW!!! This little machine is bad to the bone. I had a brand new camo shirt and after the 1st wash, it came out with thousands of fuzballs on it. I was so mad. But after I ran this Conair defuzzer, my shirt looks brand new again. Also is made my velcro on my Nite Ize cell phone holster brand new again. I highly recommend this product. Finally, a product worth spending the money for.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Davalos

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is literally THE BEST item I’ve ever bought from amazon. I was ready to give up on my furniture and buy a new set until I bought this. For ~$10 and it saved my couches! I posted it to my social media and so many friends reached out to buy it as well (I wish I got a commission, ha!). It does take patience and a few passes over the really bad area, but so worth it! Note: I’ve only used it on this type of material for cat scratching pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for upholstery pilling
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! Pilling on a new couch was driving me insane. Found this product through an influencer who recommended. My son just loves to run it over the couch and see fuzzies disappear. For upholstery it's great for the pilling and fuzzies, wish it were a bit more powerful. We have a full size sofa so it took awhile but worth it. Oddly satisfying when tou.use it and see the duzzballs disappear. I didnt want to put it down kept looking for more pilling on other items. Works great for clothing items with same issue, be careful on clothing you won't need to use as much pressure as upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Worth $11
customer_reviews.text: Seems kind of cheap but it gets the job done. I got it to fix my couch cushions after my dog messed them up and I didn’t get rid of all the little fuzzies but it got rid of most of it and it looks less worn for sure. It won’t work if you go over the area once. I went over the same spot in little circles. You will have to empty it a lot. The favor sometimes gets stuff in the center of the blade but it’s easy to unscrew and clean out
customer_reviews.author: Amberg

customer_reviews.title: The design have room for improvements.
customer_reviews.text: The defuzzer is easy to disassemble without any tools. However, I noticed that most of lints got stuck behind the blades, and the shape of the receptacle is too narrow which might be the reason why the lints didn't get to push down from the blades to the receptacle. Because of its design, I need to disassemble very often to get it clean so it could work better. Also, because the receptacle is colored and sit behind, it's not easy to see how much lints is inside. It didn't come with the little brush for cleaning so I am wondering maybe the other brand (Beautural) might work better and cost less too.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina H.

customer_reviews.title: Saves your clothes and fabrics!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this shaver to use on fitted sheets that have pilled, sweatshirts and leggings that have pilled, and to clean up loose threads at seems. This works wonderfully! It can clear through so pilling without any effort at all. It fills up quickly when there's a lot so you'll want to clean it out to keep the suction of the vacuum up, but it's very easy to do. The only fault, and it's a small one, is that the very inner section where the cutting happens is hard to grab all the fuzz out of, but using tweezers and just being careful you can get it all out.
customer_reviews.author: Selah McDaniels

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! Must have...
customer_reviews.text: Just AMAZING!! I saw this product on a random “best things on Amazon” list and it did not disappoint! I’ve had it for about a week and have defuzzed everything. It works on sweaters, tees, sweatshirts, sheets, throw pillows, dog beds... literally everything that gets fuzzy. Easy to use and clean. The pictures are of my daughters favorite 2yr old sweatshirt that has been through a hard life with an active 10yr old. This is a must have!!!
customer_reviews.author: Comfy1919

customer_reviews.title: If you only read 1star reviews like me look here
customer_reviews.text: The rechargeable one is amazing, most of the bad reviews seem to deal with the ones with batteries. The cord is nice and there's an adjustable setting for the shaver part. Also easy to empty. I suggest starting at the highest point so you don't shave too much. other than that my reviews are the same as everyone else. this product rocks I have a brand new sweater again. Took me about 5 to 10 minutes. The pics were halfway through bc I was so amazed. I tidied up the sides it literally looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

product_meta.title: Conair Fabric Defuzzer - Shaver; Battery Operated; White
product_meta.description: Style Name:BATTERY OPERATED| Color:WhiteKeep all your clothes and fabrics looking like new with the conair fabric shaver. It safely removes pills and fuzz foam all fabrics with an adjustable distance control to suit different fabric surfaces. With a large shaving head of about 1-7/8-inch, it finishes the job quickly. Plus the detachable collection compartment makes emptying easy.This fabric defuzzer features three depth settings to shave fuzz, pilling and lint from sweaters, clothing, furniture and upholstery. Fully adjustable for a variety of fabric types, this battery-powered defuzzer with a comfortable grip safely removes unwanted broken and matted fibers from your favorite sweaters, catching them in the detachable lint catcher for disposal
feature_bullets: Safely removes fuzz, lint and pilling
3 setting depth control for customized fabric "shave"; adjusts for fabric type
Detachable lint catcher and comfortable grip handle
